description: An authenticated information disclosure vulnerability exists in the ArubaOS web-based management interface. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to read arbitrary files in the underlying operating system.

product.name: Aruba Mobility Conductor (formerly Mobility Master); Aruba Mobility Controllers; WLAN Gateways and SD-WAN Gateways managed by Aruba Central
